relevance_explanation: The routine includes only logic relevant to the customer. Steps related to suspended accounts, zero balances, credit card payments, bank transfers/ACH, and late fee waivers were all correctly removed based on the customer data.
completeness_explanation: All of the required logic, tools, and branches relevant to this customer are preserved in the trimmed routine. The routine handles the high urgency, calculates patient responsibility, asks about currency, processes a digital wallet payment, issues a receipt, offers a payment plan, and finalizes the case.
